extendedInfo.description: * Smart Turtle is a simple "tap and go" teaching and quizzing game to teach toddlers about a wide variety of things from their everyday surroundings like colors, shapes, alphabets, numbers, animals and vehicles. * Smart Turtle develops toddler motor skills & hand eye coordination as well fundamentally develops mental aptitude for young toddlers. Most importantly, keeps them occupied* We started with basic shapes and colors and have had fantastic response from the public way beyond our initial expectations. After weeks of hard work and several rounds of testing we now introduce several upgrades including sections on * animals, numbers, alphabet and vehicles, colors and shapes. * There are 2 modes to choose from. Default is Learn Mode. * Quiz Mode can be selected from the "Settings" page.* Quizzing engine provides multiple sensory cues for toddlers with a accompanying voice, text on the screen & of course the color or shape itself. At each right answer, toddler is rewarded with encouraging voice of "YAY". For each wrong attempt, system guides the child to the right answer. At the end of each round, toddlers are rewarded with stars to keep them engaged & encourages them to go back again to play.* For Moms and Dads, we have included a "Use Your Voice" mode because you know your child the best - why should the child hear some random voice - Record your voice and your baby will hear your voice along with the high quality imagery from cultureapps. If you prefer - continue using voices and imagery provided by cultureapps. Based on customer feedback we are introducing a "paid version for 99 cents" with no Ads. We think you will appreciate the value for your buck !!If you have any recommendations - please get in touch via email cultapps@gmail.com to make this app better. Please get in touch.FOR THOSE UPGRADING THE NEW VERSION 2.0.2 OF THIS APP, WE SUGGEST YOU UNINSTALL THE PREVIOUS VERSION AND THEN INSTALL THE LATEST VERSIONKeywords: toddler, learn, engage, quiz, boy, girl, games, colors, shapes, alphabets, numbers, animals, vehicles, baby, kids, learn, quiz, preschool

reviews.title: could be way better
reviews.comment: It is ok...something to keep the kids busy.But the counting sucks...it goes from 1-0.My daughter is 2 and knows how to count til 15 soooo delete!could atleast go up to 10
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Its okay...
reviews.comment: My 2 year son loves this game. But after a while it stops saying what the object is. He gets mad and doesnt want to play it any more....Not sure if anyone else has had this problem, but Im about to uninstall it!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Fun for all ages
reviews.comment: My 3yr & 15mth old kids love it just needs more stuff cause they loose interest in it sooner than most toddler flashcard apps.

reviews.title: Easy for baby, difficult to record
reviews.comment: Education for baby. I love the you cab record your voice to shapes, colors, numbers, and letters.  But oats difficult because you have to go to the beginning after each  recording and go thru again to get to next letter.  Freezes frequently.   Needs lock!  Once this is resolved it will be one if the greatest!
reviews.author: Ellisse Troccoli
